channel.title: Monerica - Newest and Sponsored Listings
channel.description: The latest additions and sponsors in our directory.

item.title: ✅ Silent Exchange (sponsored)
item.description: Exchanges > Non-KYC Exchanges : Fast & Anonymous Crypto to Crypto Swaps. No email. No KYC.Trade-in Minutes. 1500+ Crypto Pairs 24/7/365 Service Fee starting from 1%. - Note: Trade using Telegram Bot - @silentexchangerobot - Location: Seychelles - Contact: @silentexchange on Telegram Email: silentexchange@protonmail.com

item.description: Merchant Services > Open Source Projects : A professional, zero-knowledge Monero Point of Sale system built with a Cypherpunk Industrial aesthetic. Your browser is your bank.

item.title: Shop-Bot-Group Software Development
item.description:
Onion Only > Merchant Tools : Create your own automatic Tor Shop, Telegram Shop Bot, Matrix Shop Bot, Session Group Chat, Matrix Group Chat, and more! Full ownership for security and scam proof. - Note: Creating shops for clients on tor, or mobile applications such as Telegram and Matrix.
We also create Group chat servers on applications such as Matrix and Session-SOGS.
Other development available also in variety of work. We are heavily skilled.

item.title: Nolan
item.description: Freelancers > Software Developers : Full stack software developer with +6 years experience. working with flask, python, linux, gunicorn, nginx and FOSS softwares.
